articles.author: Tim Bontemps
articles.title: Orlando Magic make Duke's Paolo Banchero No. 1 pick in 2022 NBA draft
articles.description: The Magic used the top pick on Paolo Banchero, who became the fourth player from Duke to go No. 1 overall. Gonzaga's Chet Holmgren and Auburn's Jabari Smith Jr. then went to the Thunder and the Rockets, respectively.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- After months of speculation, Duke's Paolo Banchero was a surprise selection by the Orlando Magic with the top overall pick in the 2022 NBA draft on Thursday night at Barclays Center.

articles.title: DP World Tour to ban LIV golfers from Scottish Open, report says
articles.description: The DP World Tour will announce on Friday that golfers participating in the LIV Golf Invitational Series won't be allowed to play at the Scottish Open, according to The Telegraph.
articles.content:

articles.title: Sources - Kyrie Irving has sign-and-trade wish list if no deal with Brooklyn Nets
articles.description: Kyrie Irving has a list that includes the Lakers, Clippers, Knicks, Heat, Mavericks and 76ers that he'd like the Nets to sign-and-trade him to if he can't reach a new deal with Brooklyn.

articles.title: Pitcher Dylan DeLucia throws shutout to lead Ole Miss Rebels to Men's College World Series final
articles.description: Ole Miss will face Oklahoma in the best-of-3 championship series this weekend after Dylan DeLucia threw a shutout, allowing four hits, walking none and striking out seven batters.

articles.title: Joc Pederson hopes San Francisco Giants fans go easy on Cincinnati Reds' Tommy Pham
articles.description: Joc Pederson said Thursday he hopes fans in San Francisco won't take it too far when Cincinnati comes to Oracle Park and Tommy Pham is playing outfield for the Reds.
articles.content:

articles.title: In Gee Chun ties women's major record with 5-shot lead after first round of Women's PGA Championship
articles.description: In Gee Chun shot an 8-under 64 for a 5-stroke lead after the first round of the Women's PGA Championship on Thursday, tying a record for the largest 18-hole lead at a women's major.
articles.content:
BETHESDA, Md. -- In Gee Chun is alone atop the Women's PGA Championship leaderboard following a sensational start.
In fact, no player has ever been further ahead after 18 holes at a women's major.

articles.description: Tyreek Hill said on the newest episode of his podcast that he received death threats on social media after he said he thought Tua Tagovailoa was a more accurate passer than Patrick Mahomes.
